attributes.action: ensure that ladies play 5 sets at Wimbledon in the interests of fairness and equality.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: now that the All England Club (having been bounced into it by Tessa Jowell last year) has decreed that men and womens prize monies be equal, it's time that in the interests of equality, and value for money, ladies matches be made equal to men, and 5 sets all round.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
